[C] For each of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When "Sky of Shooting Stars" is placed in your Climax Zone if this is in the Front Row, put up to 1 card from top of your Library in Stock, and choose up to 1 "Mio Ookami, Summer Festival and Candy Apples" in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] CX COMBO [(2) Discard a "#Hololive 4th Gen" from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "Little Devil's Eyes" is in the Climax Zone and you have another ::Hololive:: Character, you may pay cost. If so, deal 2 Damage to your Opponent twice. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] This gets -3 Level while on the Stage. Character Opposite this cannot Side Attack.
[A] [Discard a ::Hololive:: Character card from hand to the Waiting Room] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may pay cost. If so, deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)
[A] When this is Front Attacked, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room.

[A] [Clock] ALARM If this is on top of the Clock, at the start of your Climax Phase, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] [(1)] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, perform Trigger Check twice during this attack's Trigger Step."
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another ::Hololive:: Character, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] [Put the top card of your Stock in Clock] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character that is your Level or lower and Cost 0, put it Rested in any Slot on the Stage, and shuffle your Library.

[C] During your turn, all your other ::Hololive:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[A] When your other ::Hololive:: Character or this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may look at the top card of your Library. (Put it back where it was)
[A] [(1)] When a Climax is placed to your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 "#Hololive Gamers" from your Waiting Room and return it to hand.

[C] ASSIST During your turn, all your Level 0 or lower Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 1000 times your Level.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gets -X Level for the turn. X equals your Level.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another ::Hololive:: Character, choose up to 2 cards in your hand and put it in Stock in any order.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[A] When this attacks, all your Characters gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] [Discard a Climax card from hand to the Waiting Room] When the Trigger Check if this reveals a Climax card, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand."
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Cost of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When you use an [S] ability, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your ::Hololive:: Characters.
[S] [Rest 1 of your ::Hololive:: Characters] This gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1500 times # of Events in your Waiting Room.
[S] [Discard a ::Hololive:: Character card from hand to the Waiting Room] Reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Hololive:: Character, this gains the following ability for the turn. "[C] When this attacks, you may instead choose a Character in Opponent's Back Row and have this Front Attack that Character as the Defending Character." (Put the revealed card back where it was)

[C] All your other "Roboco-san, #RobocoArt" gain the following ability. "[C] For each of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gainns +1000 Power."
[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 "Roboco-san, #RobocoArt" and put it in any Slot on the Stage, and shuffle your Library.

[C] If there's 1 or fewer cards in your hand, this gains +10000 Power.
[C] BODYGUARD
[A] [Discard 3 cards from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and put it in the Waiting Room.

[C] You may play this from your hand without meeting the color requirement.
[A] When this is placed from Stage to the Waiting Room, you may return this to hand. If so, choose up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it in Stock.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if you have 2 or more other ::Hololive:: Characters, and the Battle Opponent of this is Level 3 or lower, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When you play an Event, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] [(1)] During the turn this is placed from hand to the Stage, when this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, your Opponent puts the top X cards of his or her Library in the Waiting Room. X = 6 times # of "#Hololive Gamers" in your Waiting Room.

If you have 2 or more ::Hololive:: Characters, look at up to 10 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 1 ::Hololive:: Character, put it in any Slot on the Stage, and shuffle your Library.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[C] If you have another ::Hololive:: Character, this gains +2000 Power.

If so, look at up to 3 cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, choose up to 1 of them and put it in Stock, then put the rest in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(1) Discard a ::Hololive:: Character card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "Charming Gaze" is in the Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, deal 2 Damage to your Opponent, and this gains +2000 Power for the turn. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top 3 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room.

If so, choose a ::Hololive:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 1 or lower, you may Reverse that Character.

[A] [Discard a ::Hololive:: Character card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, reveal the top card of your Library, choose a Level X or lower Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand. X = the Level of the revealed card. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[C] All your other ::Hololive:: Characters gain +1500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, perform the following action twice. "You may choose 1 of your Opponent's Level 1 or higher Character. If so, your Opponent choose a Level X or lower Character in his or her Waiting Room and Swap with the Character you chose. X = Level of the Character you chose -1."

[C] RECOLLECTION If there are 3 or more cards with different card names from each other in your Memory, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Hololive:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[C] RECOLLECTION If there are 3 or more cards with different card names from each other in your Memory, this gains the following two abilities. "[A] ENCORE [Discard either a ::Hololive:: Character card or an Event from hand to the Waiting Room]"
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Now To the Stage of Dreams" is in the Climax Zone, put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If it's Level 1 or higher, deal 3 Damage to your Opponent. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect, Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it is a ::Hololive:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +3000 Power for the turn. (put the revealed card back where it was)

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 1 or lower, you may Reverse that Character.

[A] [Return this to your hand] When your Climax card is placed in the Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, look at the top card of your Library, put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room, choose 1 of your ::Hololive:: Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] [Clock] ALARM RECOLLECTION If this is on top of the Clock and there are 2 or more cards with different card names from each other in your Memory, at the start of you Climax Phase, draw up to 2 cards, and discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room.

[C] If this is on the Stage, this is also considered to have "Roboco-san, Proud of Herself" as the name.

[A] At the beginning of your Opponent's Attack Phase, put the top card of your Library in your Waiting Room. If that card is Level 0 or lower, move this to your empty Right Front Row Slot. If that card is Level 1 or higher, move this to your empty Left Front Row Slot. (Climaxes are considered Level 0. This ability can only move this to your rightmost and leftmost Front Row Slots)
[A] At the beginning of your Climax Phase, your Opponent may put the top 2 cards of their Stock in the Waiting Room. If they do, for the turn, this cannot Front Attack.

"Discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room. If 2 cards were discarded in this way, deal 3 Damage to your Opponent, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, and put them on top of your Library in any order." (Damage Cancel can occur)

X equals the number of ::Hololive:: Characters placed in the Waiting Room by this effect.

If that card is Level 1 or higher, you may return this card to your Library. Put the revealed card back)
